archiefmat.titel: Instructies voor diverse dienaren te Essequebo en Demerarij opgesteld door de Heren X te Amsterdam
archiefmat.titel_eng: Instructions for various civil servants in Essequibo and Demerara, drawn up by the Gentlemen Ten in Amsterdam
archiefmat.scope: Instructions for the military commander (capitein van de militie), the minster of the church, Fiscal, Commissioner of the warehouses (Commissaris van de train en vivres), secretary and bookkeeper, vendumeestereerste klerk, commander of the 'Brandwagt', assistent Essequebo and assistent Demerary.
